properties.description: Local community library, offering a range of services and open to all. Located in the centre of the village. Please note that the library is run by volunteers on Tuesday afternoons, so only limited services are available at that time.

properties.address: Community Hub (at Holy Trinity Church), Macclesfield, SK10 2PX
properties.description: Come along to our community drop-in from 1pm - 4pm every Wednesday. This will be a relaxed, warm space with hot drinks. People of all ages are welcome, and there's a space with toys for little ones if you have them.
properties.title: Community Drop-in

properties.description: Open to all, we offer a warm space to come in out of the cold, talk to people like the presenters and reception staff, read a book from our library and grab a brew and a biscuit

properties.address: St Philip & St James Church, Cheshire SK9 7UZ
properties.description: A Free Community Lunch every Wednesday which takes place at the back of our church. We run Warm Wednesday's when we turn the heating on in church and host the following activities: An Art Group Singing Group Local History Group

properties.description: We are a friendly community hub and welcome everyone. Registered as a charity the Guild provides lifelong learning opportunities and social activities for the welfare of community. We serve hot food and beverages from our cafe Monday to Friday 10-3pm.
